SEARCH
Package entity.application

Class BTOApplication

Object
BTOApplication
public class BTOApplication extends Object
Represents a BTO (Build-To-Order) application submitted by an applicant. Stores details such as the project name, flat type, application status, and withdrawal request status.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Applicant
    applicant
    The applicant who submitted this application.
    private FlatType
    flatType
    The flat type the applicant has applied for (e.g., 2-room, 3-room).
    private final int
    ID
    Unique identifier for the application.
    private final String
    projectName
    The name of the BTO project this application is for.
    private ApplicationStatus
    status
    The current status of the application.
    private boolean
    withdrawal
    Indicates whether the applicant has requested a withdrawal.

    • BTOApplication

      public BTOApplication(int ID, Applicant applicant, String projectName, FlatType flatType, ApplicationStatus status, boolean withdrawal)
      Constructs a new BTOApplication with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      ID - Unique ID of the application
      applicant - The applicant submitting this application
      projectName - The name of the BTO project
      flatType - The flat type selected
      status - The application status
      withdrawal - Whether withdrawal was requested initially
